summary: Provides functionality to normalize the rotation angle of RX‑gate instructions, wrapping angles into the [0, π] interval, decomposing negative rotations into an Rz‑Rx‑Rz sequence, mapping special angles to native hardware gates (SX, X), and quantizing the angle according to a configurable resolution.
business_intent: Ensures quantum circuits are compatible with target hardware by standardizing RX angles, reducing calibration payload size, and enabling the use of more accurate, hardware‑calibrated pulse implementations.
